mapper.select: INSERT INTO userlist_has_user SELECT ( SELECT userlist.userlistid FROM userlist WHERE userlist.userlisttype = 603 AND userlist.ownerid = {myId} ), 1 WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM chatlist WHERE chatlist.myid = {myId} AND chatlist.friendid = {yourId} )

SELECT u.userid id, u.username name, u.useravatar avatar, (select COUNT(m.msgid) from message m where m.senderid = friendid and m.receiverid = myid and msgstatus = 0)unReadNum FROM chatlist JOIN user u ON chatlist.friendid = u.userid WHERE myid = #{userId} ORDER BY unReadNum DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message ( msgcontent, senderid, receiverid, msgstatus, msgtype, message.time ) VALUES ( #{msgcontent}, #{senderid}, #{receiverid}, #{msgstatus}, #{msgtype}, #{time} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM message WHERE ( message.senderid = #{myId} AND receiverid = #{friendId} ) OR ( message.senderid = #{friendId} AND message.receiverid = #{myId} ) ORDER BY message.time
